text: لِّتُؤۡمِنُواْ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ وَتُعَزِّرُوهُ وَتُوَقِّرُوهُۚ وَتُسَبِّحُوهُ بُكۡرَةٗ وَأَصِيلًا

translation.en: That you [people] may believe in Allah and His Messenger and honor him and respect the Prophet and exalt Allah morning and afternoon
translation.id: agar kamu semua beriman kepada Allah dan Rasul-Nya, menguatkan (agama)-Nya, membesarkan-Nya, dan bertasbih kepada-Nya pagi dan petang
